title: Textile, 1909
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton
Technique: plain compound satin
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Vertical panel in terra cotta, orange and cream. Upper quarter of the panel has fan-shaped arrangement of blossoms adapted from Egyptian lotus. Small lotus motifs scattered over rest of the ground.
